content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 

### Iron plate smelter at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of wooden chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Wooden chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Wooden chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5)
-  Wooden chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Wooden chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and wooden chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and wooden chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when researching Automation
-  Ensure that the lab has automation science packs in the input before researching Automation
-  Make sure there are automation science packs in the inventory before researching Automation
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure that the output of the burner mining drill is not blocked by items on the ground
-  Make sure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the burner mining drill
### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
-  Make sure the furnace is not empty and has the required resources to function properly
### Errors when using lab
-  Ensure that the lab has the required science packs in the input before researching a technology
-  Make sure the lab is not empty and has the required resources to function properly
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure that the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert items
-  Make sure the inserter is not blocked by other entities and has a clear path to the destination
### Errors when using generator and boiler
-  Ensure that the generator and boiler are properly connected with pipes and have the required fluids to function
-  Make sure the generator and boiler are not empty and have the required resources to function properly
